title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: An out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should overwrite successfully without displaying an out of sync message.
SR:
1. Open the project
2. Export the project as a jar file
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory as the project
4. Overwrite the exported jar file
5. Repeat step 4
